FlavorTextOption.Text: Commander, an unprecedented thing has happened. We have been approached by delegation of scientists, one from each of the other races in the galaxy. They have become concerned with our rise in military power and would like to make a secret agreement with us. They are willing to give us valuable technological tools in exchange for agreeing to slow down our military build up.
We certainly have no desire to force our views on others. We will gladly work with them. [COLOR=BenevolentBlue](Benevolent +60, +1000 Research points, -50% Manufacturing for 30 turns)[/COLOR]
This seems like an opportunity that we should exploit. Let us see how bad they want a deal. [COLOR=PragmaticGold](Pragmatic +50, +700 Research points, -50% Manufacturing for 20 turns)[/COLOR]
I see no need to give up our advantage. Seize the delegation and see what we can squeeze out of them. [COLOR=WarRed](Malevolent +60, +250 Tech Points, -3 Diplomacy)[/COLOR]
